recommended_swaps.title: Swap 1â€“2 Processed Meats per Week
recommended_swaps.observation: Frequent purchases of bacon, salami, and sausages
recommended_swaps.action: Swap to chicken or turkey sausage, or sliced roast chicken instead of ham or salami.
recommended_swaps.rationale: Cuts back on salt and saturated fat, but still tastes familiar.

recommended_swaps.title: Add 2 Vegetables a Day
recommended_swaps.action: Pick 2 easy veggies like spinach or frozen stir-fry mix and add to meals you already make.
recommended_swaps.rationale: More fiber and nutrients with almost no extra effort.

recommended_swaps.title: Try 1 Legume Each Week (Start with String Beans)
recommended_swaps.action: Start with string beans in stir-fries, then try canned lentils or chickpeas in wraps or stews.
recommended_swaps.rationale: Easy protein and fiber boost from plants.

notes: Recommendations based on recent HealthyFood tagged purchases. Encouraging swaps towards items with higher fibre, lower sugar, and healthier fats.
